sn37.33:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato matugamo visarado agaram ajjhavasati.
sn37.33:1.3: Panatipata pativirato ca hoti, adinnadana pativirato ca hoti, kamesumicchacara pativirato ca hoti, musavada pativirato ca hoti, suramerayamajjappamadatthana pativirato ca hoti—
sn37.33:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato matugamo visarado agaram ajjhavasati”ti.
